mapper.select: select event_id, event_name, start_time, end_time, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP < end_time) as active from event_map order by event_id desc limit 1

select event_id, type, rank, max(score) as score, max(request_time) as request_time from event_rank where event_id = #{eventId} and request_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL #{secondsAgo} SECOND group by event_id, type, rank
